prompts: Create a grass-type Pokemon that resembles a small, green snake with a plant-like tail.
I want a Pokemon that is primarily green and has a friendly, playful demeanor.
Generate a small, bipedal creature that has a yellow and green color scheme.
Make a serpentine Pokemon with distinctive leaves as its tail and a curious expression.
Imagine a starter Pokemon that evolves into a powerful grass-type with elegant features.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in forests and has a sleek, agile body shape.
Show me a Pokemon with a bright personality and a love for nature.
